alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 12:57PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, east central Liberty, northwestern Jefferson, Leon, southeastern Decatur, southern Grady and southern Thomas Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1257 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Crawfordville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Havana, Midway, Woodville, Crawfordville, Cairo, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Alma, Cody, Jewel Fire Tower, Wakulla Springs, Florence, Calvary and Medart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
